name: Esnek Rüzgar Mantarı
desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

This mushroom quickly absorbs nutrients through its extended column, and its umbrella-shaped cap turns where the wind's flow carries it.

dropMaterial.name: Mantar Sporları
dropMaterial.desc: A small amount of glittering spore powder left behind by Floating Fungi. Seems that a sneeze is all it takes for this powder to vanish without a trace.

dropMaterial.name: Parlak Polen
dropMaterial.desc: A small parcel of luminescent Fungal Spore powder, a common medical ingredient in the land of rainforests. Merchants usually sell them in paper packets.

dropMaterial.name: Kristal Toz Kutusu
dropMaterial.desc: A huge lump of spore powder collected from a structurally complete spore cyst. Put it in an appropriate environment, and the area might be filled with a thriving aggregation of Floating Fungi later...

dropMaterial.name: Etkisizleştirilmiş Mantar Özü
dropMaterial.desc:
Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elemental stimulation.

Its soothing texture makes it shockingly good for stress relief.

However, frequent usage can also easily lead to the Fungi multiplying, and thus the material is not suitable for any commercial use.

dropMaterial.name: Pasif Mantar Özü
dropMaterial.desc:
Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elemental stimulation.

There was once a protracted debate among Amurta researchers on whether the Fungi should be categorized as plants or animals. In the end, they reached an agreement and closed the case for good - the Fungi shall be its own category, neither plant nor animal.

dropMaterial.name: Dinç Mantar Özü
dropMaterial.desc:
Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elemental stimulation.

It is generally believed that the Fungi evolved into more mobile forms to better disperse their spores.

A poet once depicted a shared dream of the Fungi in which their spores covered every inch of the mountains and oceans. The world had never been more tranquil.

Then the Fungi turned into fish, birds, beasts, men, and gods, relying on rainfall, land, and their own kind who had returned to the earth.

value.text: A monster with basic intelligence that evolved from spores. When first hit by <color=#ffd780>Electro or Pyro</color> attacks, it will enter either an Activated or a Scorched state based on the elemental attack type used. Defeat this transformed fungus to obtain different types of rewards...
